title: Spells
content:
Spells are abilities that player characters can learn. The first spells are unlocked in the first steps of the tutorial after speaking to Anjay Sandorman, and continued to be unlocked throughout the game via NPCs, quests, and skilling.


 * Teleport (unlocked during Welcome to the Guard)
 * Sense (unlocked during Welcome to the Guard)
 * Immunity (unlocked during Welcome to the Guard by Ingrina Pelegrin)
 * Quartermaster (unlocked by speaking to the Quartermaster)
 * Storage Rift (unlocked by completing Spider's Nest)
 * Detect Aura (unlocked at 46 Detective)
